main event: Two to three unidentified objects observed at Foster AFB, Texas, on December 12, 1954.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 12 minutes,The objects were reported to be at an altitude of approximately 50,000 feet,One object appeared larger than the other and exhibited irregular movements,Ground radar locked onto the objects but lost track as they passed overhead,Initial identification suggested the objects were weather balloons.
witness description: Air force personnel involved in ground-radar observations
